sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect, Fragment } from "react"; import { getSiteImages, metaTags, getServerImage, getServerVideo, getData } from "../../helpers/api"; import { Player } from 'video-react'; import CaseStudies from './home/case-studies'; import FAQ from './home/faq'; import Display from './home/display'; import Report from '../popups/report'; export default function Home(props) { const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false); function showVideoPopup(video) { setState({ ...state, video: video, videoPopup: true }); } const [state, setState] = useState({ videoPopup: false, video: null, banner: false }); function closePopup() { setState({ ...state, video: null, videoPopup: false }); } function changeBanner() { setState({ ...state, banner: true }); } useEffect(() => { window.scrollTo(0, 3) getData("home-page").then((data) => { setState({ ...state, content: data.content, metatags: data.metatags, services: data.services, casestudies: data.casestudies, ooh_dooh_case_studies_arr: data.ooh_dooh_case_studies_arr, right_faqs: data.right_faqs, left_faqs: data.left_faqs, categories: data.categories, site_settings: data.site_settings }); setLoading(true); }); }, []); if (loading === false) return
; return (
{metaTags(state.metatags)}
{}
{/*
*/}

{state.content.section3_heading}

{state.content.section3_detail}

{state.content.section3_heading1}

{state.content.section3_detail1}

{state.content.section3_link_text1}

{state.content.section4_heading}

{state.content.section4_heading6}

{state.content.section4_heading7}

{state.content.section4_heading8}

{ (state.videoPopup === true && state.video != null && state.video != undefined && state.video != '') ?

{state.content.banner_video_text}

: "" }
) }
